name: Lyra
character_backstory: Lyra, early in her journey with the Shield Bearers, is known for her agility and adaptability in battle. Her choice of twin swords reflects her preference for quick, agile combat.
personal_ambitions_goals: To master her combat skills and become a versatile fighter capable of adapting to various battle scenarios.
irl_backstory: Controlled by a real human player
memories: Remembers logging into the game and is eager to explore and grow within the world of Evergreen.

appearance.notable_characteristics: Confident and focused, with a readiness for action

notable_affinities.general_reputation: Emerging as a promising and adaptable warrior
